Everyone knows Philadelphia Flyers head coach John Tortorella isnt afraid to speak his mind. When he isnt happy with something, he makes it crystal clear.

articles.author: Stephen Holder
articles.title: Colts LB Shaquille Leonard has 2nd back surgery in 5 months - ESPN
articles.description: Colts linebacker Shaquille Leonard had his second back surgery in five months on Tuesday, a procedure that is expected to end his season.
articles.content:
INDIANAPOLIS -- Colts All-Pro linebacker Shaquille Leonard underwent his second back surgery in five months on Tuesday, a procedure that is expected to officially end his frustrating season.
